name: Ambient Sound Journey Composer
description:
This tool crafts custom, long-form evolving ambient soundscapes from a simple text description. It intelligently orchestrates a detailed composition plan, breaking the total duration into smaller, evolving segments. It then generates each segment individually, ensuring smooth, gradual transitions before seamlessly stitching them into a single, continuous MP3 audio file. It relies on local sound assets.

It's perfect for creating background audio for focus, relaxation, or storytelling that evolves over time.

This tool relies on the 'ambient sound composer' tool, which you can configure first.

### How to Use It

To create your soundscape, simply write a descriptive `request` outlining the audio journey you envision. Be as detailed as you would like, or vague for more random outputs. You can define the `total_duration_minutes`, suggest a number of `segments` to guide the pacing, and provide a custom `output_filename` for the final MP3. These core inputs give you direct control over the final audio composition.

For more insight, you can use several optional toggles. Set `show_available_sounds` to `true` to get a list of all sound building blocks without generating audio. To see the AI's step-by-step "recipe" for your track, enable `show_composition_plan`. Finally, if you wish to examine the individual audio clips used, you can choose to `keep_intermediate_files` rather than having them automatically deleted.
author: @@official.shinkai

llm_composition_retries.description: How many times to retry composing a segment if generation fails. Default : 2.

llm_provider.description: Optional LLM to use for composition generation (overrides the LLM selected in the chat). Use LLM IDs as displayed in Shinkai (e.g., 'shinkai_free_trial', 'gpt_5_mini').

max_segments.description: Maximum number of segments when not specifying an exact count.

total_duration_minutes.description: Total duration of the journey in minutes. Default : 5. Decimal format (e.g., '5', '1.5', '2.25').

show_available_sounds.description: If true, returns available sounds instead of generating audio. Use 'true' to remind yourself your available sounds, use 'false' otherwise. Default : false.

segments.description: Exact desired number of segments (if provided).

request.description: Text prompt describing the sound journey to generate. Be as detailed as possible to create your vision, or vague for more random outputs. Use elements matching your available sound assets.

show_composition.description: If true, includes detailed composition metadata for each generated segment. Default : false. Use 'true' for curiosity or to ensure you could regenerate a similar output.

ensure_assets.description: Download sound assets before composing. Default : false. Keep 'false' if your library of sound assets is set.

output_filename.description: Final MP3 filename (e.g., ambient_journey.mp3). If not provided, a timestamped name is used.

min_segment_minutes.description: Minimum duration for each segment in minutes. Default : 0.15 (equal about 10 seconds).

optional_output_path.description: Optional directory path to save the final MP3; defaults to Shinkai home directory. Keep empty to access the file from Shinkai.

keep_intermediate_files.description: If true, keep intermediate segment MP3s and JSONs after concatenation. Default : false.

available_sounds.description: Catalog of available sounds when requested.

composition_details.description: Details for each generated segment when requested.

final_mp3_path.description: Absolute path to the final concatenated MP3 (if created).

global_theme.description: Global theme extracted from the plan, if available.

message.description: Status message summarizing the generation process.
